title: не расслабляйся
licensing_note: Lyrics fetched via Musixmatch API; translations via local Ollama.

lines.text: Не расслабляйся, даже когда долго в теме
lines.translation: Don't relax, even when you're deeply focused
lines.grammar: The phrase 'долго в теме' is an idiomatic expression meaning to be fully engaged or absorbed in something.

lines.text: Тем более, когда долго в теме
lines.translation: Especially when you've been in the subject for a long time.

lines.text: Сейфы спрятаны в тумбах
